DOC.brief_summary: This multiple dose study assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics investigational new drug .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety , Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics MYO-029
DOC.criteria: Men age 18 45 year inclusive study day 1 . Elderly men woman age 65 80 year inclusive study day 1 . Women must postmenopausal > = 1 year ( estradiol < 25 pg/mL FSH > 40 mIU/mL ) . Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , vital sign , clinical laboratory test result , 12leave electrocardiogram . Elderly subject may stable , nonclinically significant abnormality physical examination , laboratory evaluation . Nonsmoker .
